messages.subject: Good Chemistry Set
messages.msgSnippet: We purchased the Smithsonian MicroChemistry set.  XM5000.  It looks great...but in truth we haven t begun to use it yet.  Roxanne has always concocted and
messages.messageBody:
We purchased the Smithsonian MicroChemistry set. XM5000. It looks great...but in truth we haven't begun to use it yet. Roxanne has always "concocted" and expresses interest in chemistry. So now it is in the house for when she is ready to use it. I purchased it from a Museum on the west coast. Do an internet search and you will find it.

Lisa Heyman

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Good Chemistry Set
messages.msgSnippet: Good Morning Everyone, My ds asked this morning if he could get a Chemistry Set.  I was hoping we could get some recommendations from people who ve used them
messages.messageBody:
Good Morning Everyone,

My ds asked this morning if he could get a Chemistry
Set. I was hoping we could get some recommendations
from people who've used them before we spend money on
one that sucks...LOL We have zero experience in this
area, he's 11. Hopefully we can find a set that would
be fun and challenging but not in a way that would be
discouraging because of being to difficult.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

~Sandy Winn
